entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1 except plus 4 near the Alberta border. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1 except plus 4 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12 except minus 5 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 except minus 5 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1 except plus 5 near the Alberta border. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1 except plus 5 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
